faq_section.name: poem-faq
faq_section.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_section.label: FAQ
faq_section.description: Common questions about our AI poem generator to help you better understand and use our tool.

items.title: How does the AI poem generator work?
items.description: Our AI poem generator uses advanced large language models that understand poetic rhythm, imagery, and emotional expression through deep learning. Simply input your theme or inspiration, and the AI will analyze your requirements and generate original poetry that meets your needs.

items.title: What types of poetry are supported?
items.description: We support multiple poetry types: Modern poetry (free verse), Classical Chinese poetry (five-character quatrain, seven-character quatrain, five-character regulated verse, seven-character regulated verse, ci poetry), Specific formats (haiku, sonnet, limerick, acrostic, love poem), and song lyrics creation.

items.title: Are the generated poems original?
items.description: Yes, each poem is an original work generated in real-time by AI based on your input. The AI does not copy existing poems but creates entirely new content after learning from a vast collection of poetry works, ensuring uniqueness and originality.

items.title: What languages are supported?
items.description: Currently supports 12 languages: Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Hindi, and Italian. Each language is optimized for its poetic traditions and expressive styles.

items.title: How long does it take to generate a poem?
items.description: Generation time depends on the selected AI model: Fast mode takes about 5 seconds, Standard mode about 10 seconds, and Creative mode about 20 seconds. Creative mode takes longer but produces more artistic and expressive poetry.

items.title: How can I get better generation results?
items.description: Provide specific themes and emotional tones, choose appropriate poetry types, and use detailed descriptive words. Advanced options in professional mode help you precisely control poem length, rhyme, theme, and style for more satisfactory results.

items.title: Does generating poems consume credits?
items.description: Currently, poem generation is free to use and does not consume credits. You can create various types of poetry including modern poems, classical poetry, specific formats, and lyrics without worrying about costs.

items.title: Can generated poems be analyzed?
items.description: Yes! Our intelligent analysis feature can deeply analyze imagery, rhythm, rhetorical devices, and emotional tone of poems, helping you understand artistic characteristics and creative techniques, enhancing poetry appreciation skills.

items.title: Is voice recitation supported?
items.description: Yes, we have built-in text-to-speech functionality supporting multilingual recitation. You can adjust recitation speed to appreciate the beauty of poetry, especially suitable for poetry sharing and teaching purposes.

items.title: How can I save and share poems?
items.description: You can copy poems to clipboard, and the system automatically saves your creation history to local browser storage. You can view and manage your poetry works anytime, including search, categorization, and statistics features. Currently stores up to 10 poems with JSON export for backup.
